title: Allow kwarg-only inputs to DataParallel
body_html: Module doesn't disallow kwarg-only inputs, but DataParallel has several places where it non-crucially depends on there being positional arguments (e.g., for determining the count/index of devices). This PR removes these odd dependencies and enables, for instance, connecting generic data loaders to models that use only a subset of the loaded data
